title: Trump Has The Dumbest Enemies (Ep 1843)
description:
In this episode, I address the hilarious new attack on Trump from Liz Cheney. I also discuss the new theory proposed by the Washington Post about the infamous picture of “classified material” at Mar a Lago. 

News Picks:

US companies added just 132,000 jobs in August as hiring slows: ADP.


Biden is hemorrhaging Minority voter support.


Locals is adding a publishing feature. 


Alaska's Ranked-Choice Voting Hands Democrat Victory Over Sarah Palin.


They lied about Obamacare and student loans.

CNNer Claims Gun Ownership in America a 'Homeland Security Problem.’

content:encoded:
In this episode, I address the hilarious new attack on Trump from Liz Cheney. I also discuss the new theory proposed by the Washington Post about the infamous picture of “classified material” at Mar a Lago. 

  • News Picks:
  • US companies added just 132,000 jobs in August as hiring slows: ADP.
  • Biden is hemorrhaging Minority voter support.
  • Locals is adding a publishing feature. 
  • Alaska's Ranked-Choice Voting Hands Democrat Victory Over Sarah Palin.
  • They lied about Obamacare and student loans.
  • CNNer Claims Gun Ownership in America a 'Homeland Security Problem.’
